ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: BAL.30: Indonesia, Bali, N side of Nusa Lembongan, Tanjung Taal (= Tanjung Ental = ''Blue Corner''); 08°39'33''S 115°26'37''E; well developed reef slope, with overhanging ridges,rocky strong currents; scuba diving to 28 m depths; 19, 21.iv.2001

ncrsCollector.abcd:GatheringAgent: E. Gittenberger & D. Uit de Weerd, c., exc. RUL

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: GU.0025: Greece, Makedonia, nomos Grevena, 19 km W of Grevena, on rocks along path to Spilea toon Nymphoon, between river and mountain, 2.3 rkm before Aetia (along the road from Anavrita to Aetia), W-slope;1000 m alt.; 12.v.2000
Indian Ocean, Bay of Bengal; depth 7-8 m; collected by square nets
